name: Steal
description: Steal one item from one enemy.

name: Wildfire
description: Deal massive fire-element damage to one enemy.

name: HP Thief
description: Attacks one enemy twice with a dagger. Attacker gains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

name: Shackle Foe
description: Reduce a single foe's physical attack strength for 2 turns.

name: Armor Corrosive
description: Reduces an enemies physical defense for two turns.

name: Steal SP
description: Attack a single enemy twice with a dagger. Attacker gains SP equal to 5% of the damage dealt.

name: Share SP
description: Give 50% of your current SP to another party member.

name: Aeber’s Reckoning
description: Attack all enemies with a dagger. Damage dealt is proportional to the user’s speed stat.

name: Lion Dance
description: Raises a party member’s physical attack stat for two turns.

name: Moonlight Waltz
description: Deals massive dark-elemental damage to one enemy.

name: Peacock Strut
description: Boost a party member’s elemental attacks for two turns.

name: Mole Dance
description: Boost a party member’s physical defense for two turns.

name: Night Ode
description: Deals dark-elemental damage to all enemies.

name: Panther Dance
description: Boosts a party member’s speed for two turns.

name: Bewildering Grace
description: Causes a random effect to happen once.

name: Sealticge’s Seduction
description: Target party member’s skills that usually target one enemy will target all for three turns.

name: Rain of Arrows
description: Attack random foes 5 to 8 times with a bow.

name: True Strike
description: Deal critical damage with a bow to a single foe.

name: Thunderbird
description: Deal heavy lightning damage to a single foe.

name: Leghold Trap
description: Cause a single foe to act at the end of the turn for 2 turns.

name: Mercy Strike
description: Attack a single foe with a bow. Otherwise lethal attacks will instead leave the target with 1 HP.

name: Arrowstorm
description: Attack all foes 5 to 8 times with a bow.

name: Take Aim
description: Increase all allies' critical rate and accuracy for 2 turns.

name: Draefendi's Rage
description: Unleash a highly powerful bow attack on all foes.

name: Level Slash
description: Attack all enemies with your sword.

name: Abide
description: Increase physical attack strength for three turns.

name: Spearhead
description: Attack one enemy with a polearm and get to move earlier on the next turn.

name: Incite
description: Draw enemy attacks for three turns.

name: Cross Strike
description: Attack a single enemy with your sword.

name: Stout Wall
description: Increase physical defense for three turns.

name: Thousand Spears
description: Attack random enemies 5-10 times with a polearm.

name: Brand’s Thunder
description: potent sword attack on one enemy.

name: Fireball
description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.

name: Icewind
description: Deals ice damage to all enemies.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.

name: Analyze
description: Reveals the HP and one weakness of a single enemy.

name: Fire Storm
description: Deals fire damage to all enemies twice.

name: Blizzard
description: Deals ice damage to all enemies twice.

name: Lightning Blast
description: Does lightning damage to all enemies twice.

name: Alephan’s Enlightenment
description: Target party member’s spells that typically target all enemies will instead only target one, but with increased intensity.

name: Collect
description: Have an enemy pay for the privilege of fighting you.

name: Tradewinds
description: Deals massive wind-elemental damage to one enemy.

name: Rest
description: Skip your turn to restore your HP, SP, and status ailments.

name: Trade Tempest
description: Deals wind-elemental damage to all enemies.

name: Donate BP
description: Donates one BP to the targeted ally.

name: Sidestep
description: Dodge the next physical attack with 100% success.

name: Hired Help
description: Pay to summon hired help to fight on your side.

name: Bifelgan’s Bounty
description: Hits an enemy with one non-elemental attack and gives you cash equal to the damage you dealt.

name: Heal Wounds
description: Restores a bit of health to the whole party.

name: Holy Light
description: Attack one enemy with light-elemental damage.

name: Sheltering Veil
description: Raises a party member’s elemental defense for two turns.

name: Luminescence
description: Attack all enemies with light-elemental damage.

name: Heal More
description: Restores a significant amount of health to the entire party.

name: Reflective Veil
description: Imbues one party member with the ability to reflect a single elemental attack.

name: Revive
description: Revives all downed party members.

name: Aelfric’s Auspices
description: Allow a single party member to trigger twice per turn for three turns.

name: First Aid
description: Restore health for a single party member.

name: Icicle
description: Deals ice damage to one enemy.

name: Rehabilitate
description: Cure a single ally of all status ailments and render them immune to further ailments for 2 turns.

name: Amputation
description: A powerful axe attack on a single enemy.

name: Empoison
description: Poisons an enemy for two turns.

name: Vivify
description: Revive a single party member.

name: Last Stand
description: Attacks all enemies with aze. Deals an amount of damage inversely proportional to the users current HP.

name: Dohter’s Charity
description: Items used by the target will affect the entire party for three turns.

name: BP Boost
description: Allow a single ally to gain 2 BP per turn for 2 turns.

name: Divination
description: Increase a single ally's critical rate for 2 turns.

name: Starsong
description: Augment a single ally's physical defense, elemental defense, speed, and evasion for 2 turns.

name: Celestial Intervention
description: For 2 turns, render a single foe unable to receive attribute augmentations, or a single ally immune to attribute penalties.

name: Ethereal Healing
description: Grant HP regeneration to all allies for 2 turns.

name: Moon's Refllection
description: Grant a single ally the ability to counter physical damage one time.

name: Steorra's Prophecy
description: Unleash an elemental attack on all foes that deals damage proportional to the party's current BP.

name: Shooting Stars
description: Deal wind, light, and dark damage to all foes.

name: Fire Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional fire-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Ice Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional ice-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Thunder Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional lightning-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Wind Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional wind-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Dark Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional dark-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Light Rune
description: Weapons the user attacks with will deal additional light-based damage for 3 turns.

name: Transfer Rune
description: For 3 turns, skills that normally target yourself alone will target your allies as well.

name: Balogar's Blade
description: Deal damage from each of the six elements to a single foe.

name: Ignis Ardere
description: Deal fire damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Glacies Claudere
description: Deal ice damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Tonitrus Canere
description: Deal lightning damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Venus Saltare
description: Deal wind damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Lux Congerere
description: Deal light damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Tenebrae Operir
description: Deal dark damage to all foes 3 times.

name: Elemental Break
description: Unleash a powerful staff attack on a single foe that also reduces the target's elemental defense for 2 turns.

name: Dreisang's Spell
description: For 3 turns, elemental attacks performed by a single chosen ally will hit for critical damage.

name: Tiger Rage
description: Unleash an axe attack on all foes.

name: Qilin's Horn
description: Unleash a polearm attack on a single foe.

name: Yatagarasu
description: Unleash a dagger attack on all foes.

name: Fox Spirit
description: Unleash a staff attack on all foes.

name: Phoenix Storm
description: Unleash a bow attack on a single foe.

name: Nightmare Chimera
description: Unleash an attack on a single foe using a weapon o fyour choice. The weapon will be destroyed.

name: Guardian Liondog
description: Unleash 5 to 10 sword attacks on random foes.

name: Winnehild's Battle Cry
description: Wield six weapons to unleash six attacks on all foes.
